attributes.action: Stop charging transplant patients for the immunosuppressant drugs on which they depend.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the age of 18 patients who have undergone organ transplantation haave to pay for the combination of drugs that they must take several times a day. The government pays for medication whilst the patient is on dialysis, but not before. These drugs are effective at avoiding dialysis and are NECESSARY. It is ridiculous that these patients should have to pay for something that in most cases they have not done anything to require these drugs in the first place, much like asthmatics (who also have to pay), epileptics (who don't) and diabetics (who also don't).
